channel.title: News on R-Ladies Lausanne
channel.description: Recent content in News on R-Ladies Lausanne

item.title: R-Ladies Lausanne has a Webpage!
item.description: Blogdown + some css hacks. Sourcecode here Heavily based on R-Ladies Sydney Why? Allowing people that cannot attend our meetups to be part of it too. Click on subscribe to enable the RSS feed for this site. Contribute to our webpage The goal of this webpage is, to keep people informed about our meetups under news & blogposts, by posting news, summaries from past meetups, interviews of our speakers and list blogposts.
